contentrichtext.text: [[File:0907 Szczecin Drzetowo SZN.jpg|thumb|180px|Szczecin-Drzetowo]] [[File:0907 St Szczecin Drzetowo SZN.jpg|thumb|180px|Train station, Szczecin-Drzetowo]] '''Drzetowo''' is a part and historical municipal neighbourhood of the [[Szczecin|City of Szczecin]].<ref>Encyclopedia of Szczecin. Vol. I, A-O. Szczecin: University of Szczecin, 1999, p. 210. ISBN 83-87341-45-2 (pl)</ref> It was merged with another historical neighbourhood ([[Szczecin-Grabowo|Grabowo]]) and has formed present [[Szczecin-Drzetowo-Grabowo|Drzetowo-Grabowo]] neighbourhood. == History == Before 1945 when Szczecin (Stettin) was a part of [[Germany]], the German name of this suburb was ''Stettin-Bredow''.<ref>Encyclopedia of Szczecin. Vol. I, A-O. Szczecin: University of Szczecin, 1999, p. 210. ISBN 83-87341-45-2 (pl)</ref> == References == {{reflist}} {{Commons category|Drzetowo (Szczecin)}} {{Szczecin}} {{coord missing|West Pomeranian Voivodeship}} [[Category:Neighbourhoods of Szczecin|Drzetowo]] {{WestPomeranian-geo-stub}}
